./lib/move.rb defines a move method

examples.description: accepts 3 arguments: the board, the position a player wants to fill and their char, X or O
examples.full_description: ./lib/move.rb #move accepts 3 arguments: the board, the position a player wants to fill and their char, X or O

examples.description: provides a default value for the 3rd argument
examples.full_description: ./lib/move.rb #move provides a default value for the 3rd argument

examples.description: allows "X" player in the top left position
examples.full_description: ./lib/move.rb #move allows "X" player in the top left position
./lib/move.rb #move allows "O" player in the middle

examples.description: allows "X" player in the bottom right
examples.full_description: ./lib/move.rb #move allows "X" player in the bottom right

examples.description: allows "X" player in the bottom right and "O" in the top left
examples.full_description: ./lib/move.rb #move allows "X" player in the bottom right and "O" in the top left
./lib/move.rb #move allows "X" to win diagonally
./lib/move.rb #move allows a tie game
